annonstext:
Software Skills is a recruitment company that specialises in software and IT. We match highly skilled developers, testers and other IT experts with small and large organisations, product companies and consulting companies in Gothenburg. As represented by us, you will be guided through a friendly and professional recruitment process that aims to secure a role that perfectly matches your abilities.

Do you want to help develop a flagship security product at a new large-scale security software company? On behalf of Appgate, we are now looking for bright and talented DevOps Software Engineers to join one of their cross-functional teams in Gothenburg.

The Gothenburg office is the core innovation center for the Appgate SDP product, which provides their customers a disruptive approach to secure network access. Today, their international organisation is rapidly expanding and employs around 500 people world-wide with close to 160 software engineers. Recently, they merged with Newtown Lane Marketing and was valued at $1 billion.

If you believe you can bring passion, knowledge and innovation to the team, we would love to hear from you!

Your responsibilities and tasks

	Contributing to the automation of all their flagship security products as part of a creative cross-functional team
	Creating an automated framework for CI/CD that would help other cross functional teams to deploy and test their software faster and improve their efficiency
	Building automated tests frameworks within their DevOps environment to stimulate cross product integrations
	Always learn and bring new concepts and technology to your team

Your competencies

	3+ years of work experience in some of the following areas: Python, Golang, Rest API’s, AWS, GCP, Azure, Terraform etc. Or show desire / be prepared for a steep learning curve
	Good understanding of the Linux operating system and how to implement automatic deployment of software
	Eager to learn enough about whatever tools or tricks are needed to make things work
	Cares about readable, performant, reliable, and secure code
	Able to work with other international software teams
	Fluent in English

Interest in any of the following areas

	Cloud environments such as AWS, GCP or Azure
	Continuous deployment and integration
	Automated testing reporting frameworks
	SAAS based software delivery

The Company

Appgate, Inc. is a new and large-scale security software startup that brings together a set of highly innovative cloud- and hybrid-ready security and analytics products and services with a big focus on Network Access, Anti-Fraud and offensive security services.

Their product Appgate SDP is a context-aware, identity-centric access control solution that surpasses outdated hardware-defined and perimeter-centric approaches to infrastructure security with a “software-defined perimeter” that increases resilience, simplifies management complexity and reduces costs. Currently deployed with well over 100 customers, including a few Fortune 100 companies and governments. Appgate SDP is one of the fastest growing products within the Appgate Inc portfolio.

Click here to see an explanation video of Appgate SDP!

Why Appgate?

Appgate are creative, agile, and always encourage usage of the latest technology. In order to create an inspiring, innovative and knowledge-gathering working environment, they give their software engineers maximal autonomy. Within Appgate Inc, you will be surrounded by the world’s best ethical hackers, machine learning experts and network security engineers and you will be working in their brand new office at the heart of the Gothenburg city center.

How to apply

Please press the Apply button at the top right corner of the page. Any questions about the position? Contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  EMAIL  for more information. We consider candidates on a rolling basis, which means the role might be filled before the application deadline.

GDPR: We handle your personal data according to the General Data Protection Regulation and ask you to read our Privacy Policy before signing up to our website.
